cleaned_text: COVID-19 Info Page For the latest information regarding COVID-19 vaccine, please [https://humboldtgov.org/2872/Vaccine-Info](https://humboldtgov.org/2872/Vaccine-Info) [https://www.vaccines.gov/ - English](https://www.vaccines.gov/) [https://www.vacunas.gov/- Spanish](https://www.vacunas.gov/) For the on COVID-19 in Humboldt County, please visit: [https://humboldtgov.org/2018/Humboldt-Health-Alert.](https://humboldtgov.org/2018/Humboldt-Health-Alert) For information on what to do after COVID-19 test, and quarantine vs. isolation quick info sheet, please Health Center offers COVID-19 vaccines free of charge to all its patients! Pfizer vaccine is now available for those 5 years old and older. Those receiving Pfizer vaccines do not need to be of RRHC. Vaccine appointments are available Mondays and to your vaccine appointment. Information regarding COVID-19 vaccines: - [Registration and Informed for COVID-19 Vaccine form](https://www.rrhc.org/_files/ugd/64acd4_e06b376ffd984027a918b7224c1198aa.pdf)- please fill out and sign the form prior to your vaccine COVID-19 Pandemic As a vital component of the nation's health care safety net, Redwoods Rural Health Center is playing an important role in delivering critical services and assisting our local community during the COVID-19 emergency. We ask all patients to be pre-screened prior to checking in, as an additional safety measure necessary for reopening and to protect the most vulnerable. We ask that you please arrive 10 to 15 minutes earlier to accommodate the process.
